briefTitle: Relational and Emotional Mechanisms of a Supportive-expressive Group Intervention in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Relational and Emotional Mechanisms of a Supportive-expressive Group Intervention (SEGT) for Women With Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in quality of life across time
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* diagnosis of primary breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* attendance at a cancer support group or individual psychotherapy
* diagnosis of recurrent breast cancer
* severe psychiatric disorder
* history of drug or alcohol abuse
